mapper.sql: SELECT t.*,r.region_name,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_dept WHERE fid=t.id) as cNum FROM sys_dept t LEFT JOIN sys_region r ON t.region_code = r.region_code
mapper.select: SELECT t.*,CASE WHEN f.dcode IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS hasLeaf FROM sys_dept t LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT(fid) AS dcode FROM sys_dept where delete_flag=0) f on t.id=f.dcode where t.fid=#{fid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.id AS deptId,a.dept_name AS deptName,b.id AS subDeptId,b.dept_name AS subDeptName FROM ( SELECT id,dept_name,tree_code FROM sys_dept WHERE dept_level=2 AND LOCATE(CONCAT(tree_code,';'),(SELECT CONCAT(t1.tree_code,';') FROM sys_dept t1 WHERE t1.id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) = 1 ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id,dept_name,tree_code FROM sys_dept t WHERE id=#{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND dept_level>2 ) b ON LOCATE(CONCAT(a.tree_code,';'),b.tree_code) = 1
